ygData.subject: Re: More Charismat Carrilon data
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Has anyone ever tried sneaking into an evil city using Sonorous Clouding?? I know there really isn t much reason to do this except for maybe the excitemnt
ygData.messageBody:
>I think that since it affects the entire faction, you SHOULD be able to
>walk
>into an evil city and start changing their factions... but:
>
>a) I have a suspicion you have to modify their faction before combat gets
>started, so for aggressive NPCs, you'd better sing at them before they see
>you.
>
>b) Cities usually have many factions. I'd hate to have the guards love me
>only
>to get squished by a merchant.
>
>c) I have no idea how long this effect lasts.
>
>Jyzan


Has anyone ever tried sneaking into an evil city using Sonorous Clouding?? I
know there really isn't much reason to do this except for maybe the
excitemnt =) Just wondering

Sartori D'Elsiraad
Bard of Kelethin of the 15th Chorus
Veeshan
